Member Function Documentation

Pathname HttpClient::GetAbsolutePathname (  const Pathname &  pathname  )  [protected]
 

Converts the given user home absolute path name to an absolute path name in the RFS. The result depends on the specified user home directory.

Parameters:
pathname Path name absolute to user home
Returns:
Path name absolute to RFS root

HttpResponseCode HttpClient::GetErrorPage (  HttpResponse &  httpResponse,
HttpResponseCode  errorCode,
WString  errorDescription = L""
)  [protected]
 

Writes an error page of the HTTP server into the HttpResponse object with the given parameters.

Parameters:
httpResponse The HttpResponse that will be sent back to the client.
errorCode The HTTP error code (4xx).
errorDescription The description of the error (e.g. "File not found.").
Returns:
The appropriate HttpResponseCode of the action taken.

HttpResponseCode HttpClient::GetFavicon (  HttpResponse &  httpResponse  )  [protected]
 

Writes the favorite icon file named "favicon.ico" of the HTTP server root directory into the HttpResponse object, if the file exists. Otherwise the method generates the default file content for the favorite icon.

Parameters:
httpResponse The HttpResponse that will be sent back to the client.
Returns:
The appropriate HttpResponseCode of the action taken.

HttpSocketPtr HttpClient::GetHttpSocket (   )  [virtual]
 

Returns a smart pointer to the communication socket.

Returns:
Smart pointer to the communication socket.

UINT HttpClient::GetId (   )  [virtual]
 

Returns the ID of the client.

Returns:
ID of the client.

Reimplemented from ServerClient.

HttpResponseCode HttpClient::GetIndexPage (  const HttpRequest &  httpRequest,
HttpResponse &  httpResponse
)  [protected]
 

Writes the index page file named "index.html" of the HTTP server root directory into the HttpResponse object, if the file exists. Otherwise the method generates dynamic output listing all registered web applications.

Parameters:
httpRequest The HttpRequest that was sent by the client.
httpResponse The HttpResponse that will be sent back to the client.
Returns:
The appropriate HttpResponseCode of the action taken.

HttpResponseCode HttpClient::GetStyleSheet (  HttpResponse &  httpResponse  )  [protected]
 

Writes the style sheet file named "stylesheet.css" of the HTTP server root directory into the HttpResponse object, if the file exists. Otherwise the method generates the default file content for the style sheet.

Parameters:
httpResponse The HttpResponse that will be sent back to the client.
Returns:
The appropriate HttpResponseCode of the action taken.

HttpResponseCode HttpClient::OnFileRequest (  const Pathname &  pathname,
HttpResponse &  httpResponse
)  [virtual]
 

Handles a file request and adds the content for the appropriate response in the given object.

Parameters:
pathname The pathname of the requested file.
httpResponse The HttpResponse object which will be used for adding header fields and file data.
Returns:
The appropriate HttpResponseCode of the action taken.

BOOLEAN HttpClient::OnHttpGetRequest (  HttpRequest &  httpRequest  )  [virtual]
 

Handles an HTTP request which uses the command GET and returns the response to the client.

Parameters:
httpRequest An HTTP request. (Attention: this object MUST include c_http_request_method_get as request method!)
Returns:
Whether the operation was successful or not.

BOOLEAN HttpClient::OnHttpPostRequest (  HttpRequest &  httpRequest  )  [virtual]
 

Handles an HTTP request which uses the command POST and returns the response to the client.

Parameters:
httpRequest An HTTP request. (Attention: this object MUST include c_http_request_method_post as request method!)
Returns:
Whether the operation was successful or not.

Handles an HTTP request and returns the response to the client via the socket.

Returns:
Whether the operation was successful or not.
